definition: front/forward/ahead/first/top (followed by a number)/future/ago/before/BC (e.g. 前293年)/former/formerly

sentences.english: For the last three years, I’ve run a preschool with my wife.
sentences.chinese: 在過去的三年裏，我和妻子經營了一個學前班學校。

sentences.english: For this year's graduates of preschool, the pressure begins.
sentences.chinese: 對於今年從學前班畢業的小朋友們，壓力來了。

sentences.english: Yet there are even kindergartens and pre-schools that hold graduations.
sentences.chinese: 到目前爲止，甚至幼兒園和學前班把持着畢業生。

sentences.english: You wouldn't just cut out second grade. Why are we just cutting out pre-K?
sentences.chinese: 你不會只是削減二年級，爲什麼我們只裁學前班？

sentences.english: That was pre-school children cry of alarm sound.
sentences.chinese: 那是學前班的孩子們驚恐的哭喊聲。

sentences.english: On the Internet, 30 Arundel students from kindergarten to the fifth grade log on to computers everyday.
sentences.chinese: 阿校的學生從學前班到五年級每天上網。

sentences.english: Students in a pre-kindergarten class sang in Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 學前班的孩子在用漢語唱歌。

sentences.english: When children go to pre-school, they will build upon the skills first learned at home.
sentences.chinese: 當孩子上學前班，他們將先在家建構這些技能。

sentences.english: He says he'll never forget the strong influence of his preschool teachers.
sentences.chinese: 他說他永遠都不會忘記學前班老師對他的教育及影響。

sentences.english: His mother was getting calls from hispreschool almost every day.
sentences.chinese: 他的媽媽幾乎每天都會接到學前班打來的電話。

sentences.english: Preschools too are adding language instruction.
sentences.chinese: 學前班的課程中也增加了外語教學。

sentences.english: More than half of the U. S. elementary schools have kindergarten attached to them.
sentences.chinese: 超過一半以上的美國小學都有其附屬的學前班。

sentences.english: Should you let your three-year-old wear her child-friendly nail polish to preschool?
sentences.chinese: 你會讓三歲的小娃娃戴着兒童指甲花去學前班嗎？

sentences.english: S. elementary schools have kindergarten attached to them.
sentences.chinese: 超過一半以上的美國小學都有其附屬的學前班。

definition: (Tw) (slang) to pass time idly/to chill/to hang out
at a loss/unable to do anything about it/to have no choice
see 驢唇不對馬嘴|驴唇不对马嘴[lu:2 chun2 bu4 dui4 ma3 zui3]
pinyin: niu2 tou2 bu4 dui4 ma3 zui3
